title: uninstall saved originating repository while I was trying to "drop" a file under some git-annex repo underneath
body:
I think I lost the original message it spit out but here is how subsequent call looks like:

```shell
hopa:~pymvpa/pymvpa
$> datalad uninstall datadb/tutorial_data/tutorial_data/hyperalignment_tutorial_data.hdf5.gz
[WARNING] Was instructed to commit ['/home/yoh/proj/pymvpa/pymvpa', '/home/yoh/proj/pymvpa/pymvpa'] files but repository is not dirty 
Nothing was uninstalled

```
and it didn't drop that file and just saved pymvpa repository:
```
$> git show --stat
commit b6fe4b43710a94d3088d77e522e8bd557dea46b3
Author: Yaroslav Halchenko <debian@onerussian.com>
Date:   Fri Nov 11 12:50:31 2016 -0500

    [DATALAD] auto-saved changes

 .gitmodules                                              | 6 ++++++
 3rd/bibstuff                                             | 1 +
 3rd/pybetaseries                                         | 1 +
 doc/broken.links                                         | 1 +
 doc/examples/clfs_examples.py_TROUBLESHOOT               | 1 +
 doc/examples/match_distribution_report.log               | 1 +
 doc/examples/sensanas_debug.py                           | 1 +
 doc/examples/sensanas_debug.sh                           | 1 +
 doc/misc/references_ascii.bib                            | 1 +
 doc/pics/pymvpa_logo_pie.svg                             | 1 +
 doc/source/tutorial_classifiers-script.py                | 1 +
 doc/source/tutorial_classifiers.html                     | 1 +
 doc/source/tutorial_eventrelated-script.py               | 1 +
 getattr-error.txt                                        | 1 +
 mvpa2/algorithms/hyperalignment.py.orig                  | 1 +
 mvpa2/algorithms/hyperalignment.py_randomlevel2          | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_20mm/data/anat.nii.gz           | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_20mm/data/attributes.txt        | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_20mm/data/bold.nii.gz           | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_20mm/data/bold_mc.par           | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_20mm/data/bold_mean.nii.gz      | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_20mm/data/mask_brain.nii.gz     | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_20mm/data/mask_gray.nii.gz      | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_20mm/data/mask_hoc.nii.gz       | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_20mm/data/mask_vt.nii.gz        | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_20mm/data/mask_white.nii.gz     | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_masked/data/anat.nii.gz         | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_masked/data/attributes.txt      | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_masked/data/bold.nii.gz         | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_masked/data/bold_mc.par         | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_masked/data/bold_mean.nii.gz    | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_masked/data/mask_brain.nii.gz   | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_masked/data/mask_gray.nii.gz    | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_masked/data/mask_hoc.nii.gz     | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_masked/data/mask_testing.nii.gz | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_masked/data/mask_vt.nii.gz      | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_masked/data/mask_white.nii.gz   | 1 +
 mvpa2/data/tutorial_data_masked/mask_testing.nii.gz      | 1 +
 mvpa2/suite.py.orig                                      | 1 +
 mvpa2/tests/badexternals2/h5py.py                        | 1 +
 mvpa2/tests/badexternals2/lxml.py                        | 1 +
 mvpa2/tests/test_datameasure.py.andytoyingaround         | 1 +
 mvpa2/tests/test_hyperalignment.py.orig                  | 1 +
 mvpa2/tests/test_testing.py_aside                        | 1 +
 protocol                                                 | 1 +
 pymvpa2.cfg.causechaos                                   | 1 +
 pymvpa2.egg-info/PKG-INFO                                | 1 +
 pymvpa2.egg-info/SOURCES.txt                             | 1 +
 pymvpa2.egg-info/dependency_links.txt                    | 1 +
 pymvpa2.egg-info/top_level.txt                           | 1 +
 50 files changed, 55 insertions(+)
```

something I really didn't intend to accomplish ;)

Expected behavior was just to have that file 'git annex drop-ed' in the corresponding git-annex repository under and original (pymvpa) repository not being touched.
